allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve: Enhance ASN registration country detection with multiple fallback methods

- Add ipinfo.io ASN query as a more reliable fallback source
- Expand ASN-to-country mapping with IPXO/LINVEO, major backbone networks, and more cloud providers
- Expand ISP name inference to include IP brokers \(IPXO, Linveo, Interlir\) and more hosting providers
- Improve BGPView JSON parsing with multiple matching patterns
- Fix empty string handling in ISP/ASN guess functions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve: Add DMIT ASN and ISP mapping for registration country detection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
